newsitem.title: USA: Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Inc Q3 net rises.
newsitem.headline: Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Inc Q3 net rises.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
(All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: 1995 earnings per share and average share figures are on pro forma basis.
DLJ is 80 percent beneficially owned by Equitable Cos Inc. The company completed its initial public offering in October, 1995.
